scripts.clean: npm run lint && npm run prettier
scripts.build: npm run tsc && rimraf dist && esbuild src/bundle.ts --bundle --format=iife --target=es6 --global-name=mke --outfile=dist/MathKeyboardEngine.es2015-iife.js & esbuild src/bundle.ts --bundle --format=esm --target=es2017 --outfile=dist/MathKeyboardEngine.es2017-esm.js & esbuild src/bundle.ts --bundle --minify --format=iife --target=es6 --global-name=mke --outfile=dist/MathKeyboardEngine.es2015-iife.min.js & esbuild src/bundle.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --target=es2017 --outfile=dist/MathKeyboardEngine.es2017-esm.min.js & esbuild src/bundle.ts --bundle --format=esm --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/MathKeyboardEngine.es2020-esm.js & esbuild src/bundle.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/MathKeyboardEngine.es2020-esm.min.js

name: mathkeyboardengine
description: MathKeyboardEngine provides the logic - in JavaScript and LaTeX - for a highly customizable virtual math keyboard.
author: MathKeyboardEngine
